moves.1. e4: This is my first annotation so excuse the errors, standard king pawn opening
moves.2... Nc6: knight defends king pawn and attacks d4
moves.3. Nc3: I am trying to open up a queen pawn attack here
moves.4. Bb5: I decide to mix it up, in hindsight a mistake
moves.4... Nd4: attacks the knight defended by the pawn
moves.5. Ba4: I should have taken the knight here but was unhappy with the pawn attacking my knight
moves.5... Bc5: sensible knight attack for good position
moves.8. Nd5: but I go on the attack
moves.8... Nxd5: good move as it opens up the attack on the king
moves.9. exd5 Re8+: not happy to give up the queen so try to get out of it
moves.11. f3: not sure why I did this blind panic I think
moves.12. Nc5: desperate defence but I know I have lost

gameName: Walking the Walk and Learning to Run MT Part 4
